transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji aawaz aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uh, kaisa chal raha hai sir services IndiaMART pe kuch use vagerah kar rahe hai?
Customer: Are madam is samay to aise matlab jo main jo sale karta hi nahi paas paas 10-10 inch ka ye kya hai
Customer: display aa raha hai display LED display ye sab hum karte hi nahi hai.
Executive: Thoda isko theek kar lete hai aur dusra cheez kya aapka jo mail hai na sir continuously bounce ho raha hai.
Executive: 92.aby@gmail.com mail id ko bounce ho raha hai.
Executive: Samajh rahe hai to bounce ho raha hai to usko bhi theek karna hai change karna hai to aap thoda sa ek meeting schedule karo aap aa sakte hai kya online?
Customer: Abhi main drive pe hi hu.
Executive: Kya driving kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha abhi main travelling kar raha hu.
Executive: To kab tak mujhe call karna chahiye aap ye bataiye.
Customer: Aap mujhe madam ek ghante mein kariye na.
Executive: Aur badi baat kar sakte hai phone pe?
Customer: Haan baat to kar sakte hai koi aur chala koi ho raha hai baat kar sakte hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aap jo keh rahe hai.
Executive: Mail ka to ek ghante baad kar lenge change ye jo aap problem bata rahe hai aapne kya problem aa raha hai lead ka?
Customer: Wo jo main jo product sale karta hu main wo aa hi nahi raha hai uska lead hi nahi aa raha hai keval jo hai tv ka display
Customer: mobile ka display ya other display ye sab display main karta hi nahi hu mera display wo wala display hai hi nahi hamara to interactive flat panel hai na digital board hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Ye sab display wo aa raha hai pata nahi kya kya aa raha hai uska koi matlab hi nahi raha hai isliye maine bahut sara usko jo hai wo sir se bhi bola tha to kaha ki usko aap ek do baar hide kariye to wo hi aa hi raha hai to main dusra kya hi karu.
Executive: Itna jo screen display catalog mein pada hua hai isko hataye fir ye product pada hua hai to isliye se aa raha hai LED display ka.
Customer: To but to matlab wahi cheez main keh rahi thi jo maine waise digital board maine bataya tha unko add karne ke liye jo interactive flat panel digital pata nahi kisko bataya tha aapne kaun kaun
Customer: Ye hai jab main dekh raha aapke jo hai Basti ke sir hai Basti side se kya naam hai naam to yaad nahi aa raha keh rahe hai ki abhi aisa nahi kiya gaya hai aapka wo profile dekhne ke liye.
Hmm.
Customer: Unhone kaha theek hai.
Executive: Nahi to touch screen display mein kaam nahi karte aap galat product add hai isliye aisa hai aap theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan to theek hai baki kuch maine usko bheja tha email bhi bheja tha video bhi wo add karne ke liye bheja tha fir wo main jo karta hu uska image picture ek bhi pura laga nahi hum kaise nahi laga hai main apne behalf se kuch lagaya maine unko kaha ki thoda sa aap laga dijiye complete kar lijiye.
Hmm.
Customer: Unhone ki theek hai.
Executive: Dekhiye wo touch screen display catalog mein product tha na jiski wajah se problem aa raha tha abhi maine usko hata diya to ab wo problem nahi aayega theek hai ab baki jo hai ye jo mail id aapki primary mail id hai ye bounce ho raha hai sir isme space hai nahi to aapko isko aapko clear karna padega ya fir dusri mail id aapko update karni hogi.
Customer: To main main dusra main jo add kiya to aa raha hai wahi hai sir.
Hmm?
Customer: Jaise main use dusra email id add kiya tha fir chalne laga fir uske baad fir main nahi kar pa raha tha ki ek to aa raha hai baar baar matlab usko maine change kar diya uske bawajud bhi.
Executive: Aapka mail id jo yaha pe registered hai 92.aby@gmail.com naya naya hai purana hi hai ye?
Customer: Ye purana hai.
Executive: Isko naya kariye na sir iski jagah pe dusra mail id kyunki isme space nahi hai.
Customer: To wahi cheez main keh raha hu ki jo dusra wala maine add kiya hai wo ek baar ho gaya fir dobara wo kyun nahi ho raha hai baar baar yahi issue aa raha.
Executive: Achha aap app already dikha raha hai ki jo hai add main kiya hu to wo already dikha raha hai ki jo hai added aur red signal mein aa ja raha hai.
Executive: Main main karwa dungi ek baar ek ghante baad aap online aao theek hai aur isko thoda sa discuss karke hum isko theek kar lete hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Aur dusra jo hai rest aur koi concern aapka?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji madam bataiye.
Executive: Keh rahe hai aur koi problem sir?
Customer: Nahi madam yahi hai ye jo hai maine aapko bataya ek to ye email id wala hai dusra jo jo lead aa raha hai madam wo mere main theek kar diya ye touch screen mein pada tha us wajah se dikkat aa raha tha catalog mein jo product hai interactive flat panel interactive board interactive white digital board interactive classroom board LG digital board interactive board writing board theek hai yahi hai product.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai baki jo hai ek kaam karte hai sir ki isme jo hai agar aapko iska jo hai
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan thoda sa na inquiries nahi aa rahi na inquiries calls vagerah.
Customer: Inquiries nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Thoda listing bada aaj kal log itna jyada isme product line jo hai aati hai pehle dekho kitni call aati thi abhi ekdam kam ho gayi thoda star mein jyada log hai na sir isme competition bahut high hai.
Customer: Matlab theek hai main ban gaya.
Executive: Aisa udhar bhi humne renewal ke time pe bhi discuss kiya tha sir to aap soch rahe the fir aapne karaya nahi sir usko TrustSeal wala.
Customer: TrustSeal maine kya kare main jo business thoda sa aata hai to fir main usko bhi kar leta abhi business bilkul nahi aap do mahina ruk ke isko karaya jayega.
Customer: Haan to karaiye madam jaise maan lijiye jo business kabhi nahi aa pa raha hai to wo main keh ke bhi jo hai ab main kaise kahu ki haan main kar lu jaise aata rehta hai main to usme chalo ek usko kara li idhar nahi business aaya madam.
Customer: Diwali mein sochiye Diwali mein aisa hona chahiye Diwali mein mera business wo sach nahi hai maine ek do kar paya tha mushkil se.
Hmm.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai ek kaam karte hai aap jo hai isko dekhiye theek hai aur mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai dekhiye aur online aake mujhe bataiye theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Email ID continuously bouncing.

- Unable to add a new email ID.

- Business is not good.



Resolution:

- Removed touch screen display from catalog.

- Executive will help to fix email issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect after 1 hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, email, catalog, subscription
